title: The Best Cakes in Town
seoDescription: About Cakes and Crumbs in Melaka
content:
This is the place to be if you want to get the best cakes and pastries and even ice cream.

You never know how much to miss something until you lose it. As such you will never know how much you've missed until you've tried it

Certainly that's a lot of typing but not too cohearent. 

Certainly we could do more.
subtitle: You never want to miss it after trying, there's no going back
